messages.content: Vote Labour on Thursday 8th June to ensure we have strong Labour MPs in Parliament standing up to the Tories.

messages.title: Same old nasty Tories
messages.content: They are threatening to take money from pensioners, force people to use their homes to pay for care, take school lunches from children.

issues.health: The Tories have brought the NHS to its knees. When a loved one is sick, families shouldn't be worried about the future of their home.
issues.socialWelfare: Many families are dependent on the free school meal which the Tories plan to axe. It is simply wrong that under the Tories more children are living in poverty.

housing.content: force people to use their homes to pay for care

contactInformation.address: Campaigns Office, General Election Freepost, c/o General Election Agent, Suite 127, Spencer House, Warrington, WA3 7PG

quotes.text: The Tories have brought the NHS to its knees. When a loved one is sick, families shouldn't be worried about the future of their home.
Many families are dependent on the free school meal which the Tories plan to axe. It is simply wrong that under the Tories more children are living in poverty.
Under the Tories I stand to lose my Winter fuel allowance; many pensioners will once again be facing a cold bleak future.

images.caption: A healthcare professional standing outside a clinic.
A family sitting together on a couch.
